title: Understand the Data
text: Before diving into analysis, ensure you understand the type of data you have. Is it quantitative or qualitative? 📊

title: Data Collection
text: Gather all relevant sales data for the month. This includes sales figures, product names, and any other pertinent information.

title: Organize the Data
text: Arrange the data in a structured format, such as a spreadsheet, to make analysis easier. 📈

hintAnswer: Sort the data by sales figures to identify the product with the highest sales.
title: Identify the Best-Selling Product
text: Once the data is organized, what should you do next to find the best-selling product?
choices: Sort the data by sales figures
Look for the product with the lowest sales
